name: todos
description: The list of todos in NextJS.

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-frontend && npm run install-codegen
scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-codegen
scripts.lint: npm run lint-frontend && npm run lint-codegen
scripts.format: npm run format-frontend && npm run format-codegen
scripts.prep: npm run install-all && npm run build && npm run format

author: GabenGar
